RelatedSentence: WASHINGTON - A grand jury in the Western District of Pennsylvania ( WDPA ) indicted five Chinese military hackers for computer hacking , economic espionage , and other offenses directed at six American victims in the U.S. nuclear power , metals , and solar products industries .

The indictment alleges that the defendants conspired to hack into American entities to maintain unauthorized access to their computers and to steal information from those entities that would be useful to their competitors in China , including state - owned enterprises ( SOEs ) .
